title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2013 - Katowice, Poland
description:
For the first time in Silesia we are organizing an event: Global Day of Coderetreat! 
Get more information about this event: http://coderetreat-katowice.pl
 (http://gdcr.coderetreat.org/) 
We are part of a Software Craftsmanship Silesia group. We are planning our meeting in conference centerÂ in Katowice, Jordana 18th Street. 
Registration and more information about the event, will be available soon at: http://www.meetup.com/sc-silesia/
